RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Й graduado em Engenharia Mecвnica pela Universidade Federal do Paranб (2003); Mestre em Aerodinвmica, Propulsгo e Energia, pelo Instituto Tecnolуgico de Aeronбutica (2006), e й Doutor em Engenharia de Mбquinas de Fluxo pela Universidade de Gкnova (2009). Atuou em pesquisa nas seguintes бreas de conhecimento: turbinas a gбs, reversores de traзгo, CFD, sistemas hнbridos com cйlulas a combustнvel e anбlise termoeconфmica. Desde 2010 й Especialista em Regulaзгo da Aviaзгo Civil, na Agкncia Nacional da Aviaзгo Civil - ANAC, atuando na бrea de processo normativo de aeronavegabilidade. Desde 2017 ocupa o cargo de Gerente Tйcnico de Processo Normativo na Superintendкncia de Aeronavegabilidade da ANAC.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: He has degree in Mechanical Engineering at Paranб Federal University (2003), MSc in Aerodynamics, Propulsion, and Energy at Aeronautical Technological Institute (2006), and Ph.D. in Flow Machine Engineering at University of Studies of Genoa (2009). He has experience in research in the folowing areas: gas turbines, thrust reversers, CFD, SOFC hybrid systems, and thermoeconomic analysis. From 2010 he is a Civil Aviation Regulation Specialist in the National Civil Aviation Agency - ANAC, Brazil, working in rulemaking of airworthiness. Since 2017 he is the Rulemaking Technical Manager in the Airworthiness Department of ANAC.
